scripts.compile: npm run compile:tsc && npm run compile:tsc-alias
scripts.pre-build: npm unlink nexious-library && npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.build:alias: npm run clean && npm run compile:alias
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish
